entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing .net preview 8 removes Maui templates #15618
  • Context Flyouts work in very few and very specific situations and nowhere else. #15616
  • Best Practices for SVG and Images #15611
  • InputTransparent with Opacity/IsVisible behaves differently with iOS/Mac vs Windows/Android #15608
    Backlog
  • Missing StaticResource should throw exception also in Debug #15602
    Backlog
  • A11y_.NET Core_MAUI_Recipe Search_Keyboard : The Recipe Items are not able to access using keyboard. #15599
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NET Core_MAUI_Recipe App_Screen reader : Narrator is announcing button but there is no visible control/button present in the screen #15598
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_New Recipe_Labels or Instructions: In "New Recipe" screen required fields are not marked up with any chevron/symbols. #15597
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Voiceover: Voice over is not announcing the "Review" label for slider, Minus, Plus buttons. #15595
    .NET 8
  • Different sizing and layouting strategy on different platforms #15594
    Backlog
  • [XVS][VSM][MAUI] The launch screen of the app is not correct on android and iOS target. #15593
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI]The Vertical CollectionView rendering is incorrect when scrolling "Breakfast" to bottom on iOS and Maccatalyst target. #15592
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI] The page cannot scroll to the bottom and the botton text is truncated on iOS and Maccatalyst target. #15591
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI] The card is truncated when scrolling to the right of the page on iOS target. #15590
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI] After rotating the Emulator/Simulator to horizontal orientation, the text in the picture disappears and the button is truncated. #15589
    .NET 8

Closed

  • Add Marker Clustering to .NET MAUI Maps #15550
  • UWP backend for .NET MAUI. #15568
  • [Windows] WebView EvaluateJavaScriptAsync returns an incorrect result #15233
    Backlog
  • CollectionView inside a Grid completely wrong measurements. #15553
  • Pasted text is shown in cleartext (not hidden) in Entry with IsPassword=true #11478
    Backlog
  • Swapping MainPage performance ( black screen) #11560
    Backlog
  • HotReload doesn't work for DataTemplate property changes in custom controls #10066
    Backlog
  • SearchHandler doesn’t show results on iOS #13470
    Backlog
  • Cannot change the border color of an ImageButton #15479
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Include documentation section about OnSizeAllocated #15617
  • Add 8.0.0-preview.5.8529 to bug report issue template #15615
    community ✨
  • [android] improve performance of `Entry.MaxLength` #15614
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Fix toolbar OverflowIcon color not getting properly set. #15612
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Implement ItemsUpdatingScrollMode on CollectionView #15601
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix CharacterSpacing on SearchBar on iOS to be actually set #15596
    community ✨

Merged

  • Add Forms->MAUI differences notes to layout dev docs #15551
    area/docs 📓, area/layout 🔲
  • [Windows] Avoid unexpected characters from WebView EvaluateScript #15471
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1774.30 to 1.0.1823.32 #15474
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.6.1 to 17.6.2 #15502
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15447
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #15478
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.15.1 to 4.15.1.1 #15407
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Hook up ScrollViewer event tracking in Windows CollectionView #15555
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 Planning
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Fix sizing issues with CollectionView on Windows #15587
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
